name: CivWonders
description:
This is the Alpha version of CivWonders, a multiplayer civ-like board game. Place tiles in order to generate resources, infrastructure, and units. Use your military, trade routes, or cultural buildings to become the most powerful civilization.

A poor quality AI is provided for practicing before engaging human opponents online.

NOTE: This is at a very early stage and is probably not well balanced, yet.

Audio assets are placeholders, and will be replaced if this becomes non-free at some point.
